p: There was only one individual that harbored the 1534L in our samples, leading to the identification of one 1534L haplotype (D3H12). D3H12 was highly similar to MH384952.1 ( Ae. albopictus voucher JN08 voltage-gated sodium channel gene) [ 18]; they encoded the same amino acid sequence with only one variation (G/A) in the third position of codon 1534 (Fig.Â 5). No haplotype harboring both 1532 and 1534 mutations was observed after examining all 12 specimens that carried both 1532T and 1534S.
